definitions.definition: a person who gains as a result of something

examples.text: Who will be the main beneficiary of the cuts in income tax?

definitions.definition: a person who receives money or property when somebody dies

examples.text: She was the sole beneficiary of her father’s will.

wordOrigin: early 17th cent.: from Latin beneficiarius, from beneficium ‘favour, support’, from bene ‘well’ + facere ‘do’.
